  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ClientAuth getInstance()
      Tries to update the instance with the ClientAuth created by the clientAuthCompletableFuture and returns it. If the clientAuthCompletableFuture is null however, or an error occurs, it tries to update and return the instance synchronously using createClientAuth()
      Returns:
      A ClientAuth Object that has been initialized and is ready for requests.
      See Also:
      createClientAuth()

    • createClientAuth

      public static ClientAuth createClientAuth()

    • createMessageJson

      public com.google.gson.JsonObject createMessageJson()
      Creates a signature JsonObject that authenticates that the player with UUID uuid is the owner their account.
      Returns:
      A ClientAuth Object that has been initialized and is ready for requests.
